title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5100.4 - Words and terms; tense and number
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5100.4 - Words and terms; tense and number

State Regulations

In construing the provisions of these regulations, except
when otherwise plainly declared or clearly apparent from the context: (a) Words in the present tense shall include
the future tense. (b) Words in the
singular shall include the plural and the plural shall include the
singular. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5100.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
